title: Absolute Joke of a Download Speed
body:
Just got into the game again, the Client patch was around 500 mb, took 5 minutes to download.
The actual patch for the game? Starts at 3200 KB/s and proceeds to drop until < 500 KB/s.
I have no clue why it drops to that speed, I live 40 minutes away from the server, and my ISP goes straight into 350 E Cermak, where the servers are being hosted. I can download a 2 GB Overwatch patch in 10 minutes, but for some reason, the new League Client takes EIGHTY MINUTES for a patch the same size. Pathetic.

replies.body: That is a little odd that you're able to download other patches much faster. It could be due to how your connection is being routed, which you can check by doing a [**trace route**](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available) to our servers at 192.64.170.1. Hit me back up with that traceroute and we can go over the results!
Im dling the patch at 37kbs atm ><
